isAudio.description: check if the value is of type audio

context.description:
Consider this transcript:
------

${transcriptText}

-----

Please respond with a summary and a suitable title, subtitle, keywords and names of people and companies.

Consider this transcript:

-----

${transcriptText}

----


In some cases the language is interpreted wrongly, resulting in a complete nonsensical transcript (e.g. it writes English if the speaker spoke Dutch) 

Does this transcript make sense, as in, do the words form coherent sentences?

Example of a transcript that makes sense:  "ga nu verder met mijn verhaal wat ik natuurlijk moet verkopen wat ik natuurlijk aan de man wil brengen is niet alleen het pijn telefoonnummer het is de experience het is het gevoel gevoel van vrijheid gevoel om des nachts je bent uit te gaan en de nachtwoning maakt omdat je gewoon niet omdat je niet kan slapen"

Consider this transcript:
----------

${transcriptText}

-----------

Please summarise the transcript. Then, please extract core beliefs and opinions that were made (if any). Ensure to provide a broad context for each item in your bullet list.

personalMessageAnalysis.description: True if this is a personal message

context.description:
Consider this transcript: 
----

${transcriptText}

----

In this transcript, does the main speaker clearly mention to send this as an email or message to another person or company? If so, which person/company needs to receive a message?

Consider this transcript.

----

${transcriptText}

----

Please write a personal authentic message to ${personalMessageTo} that can be emailed.

- Do not change any wording, except if it's unusual for written text.
- Ensure to fix spelling mistakes or word-errors (e.g. names and companies are often misheard)
- Ensure to omit misspeaking that were self-corrected, and make them more concise
- Ensure the email is in the same language as the transcript!

Consider this mail draft:

---

${personalMessageCleaned}

---

What's the subject?

context.subject: Draft to ${personalMessageTo} : ${personalMessageSubject}
Draft to ${personalMessageTo} : ${personalMessageSubject}

context.description:
Consider this transcript:

------

${transcriptText}

------

Has the transcript mentioned the term "Operator" or "Screenless"?

Consider this transcript:

----

${transcriptText}

----

Did the speaker(s) request any visualisations?

Consider this transcript:
-------
${transcriptText}
-------

Are there any statements in there that are tweetable?

Statements are tweetable if:
- The statement is understandable by a broad audience independent of the rest of the transcript
- The statement conveys something interesting like news, opinion, fact, or question

hasOtherSpeakers.description: If more than 1 speaker... This happens

context.description:
Has other speakers: ${hasOtherSpeakers}
Consider this transcript:
----
${transcriptText}
----

Please follow my instructions in the following steps:

STEP 1: summarise what every speaker has added to the conversation.
STEP 2: summarise the entire conversation between each speaker in no more than 100 words.

Consider this speakers analysis:

---

${speakersAnalysis}

---

Please provide me the summary of the conversation.

relationIds.description: To be filled in by the user or automatically from phonecalls or meetings. Must be selected from the users user-centric relations. Should be string[]

context.description:

----


Please remove mistakes if found, and replace the italic words by the more logical word in the context.

- describe each item in max 1 word
- minimum 2 minutes per topic

Full transcript

Did you know...

  • Screenless is fully private by design: transcripts aren't stored at our servers
  • We're building an AI companion that can do much more than just listen. Get in touch to join the alpha program!
  • You can also call Screenless instead of whatsapp! Just call +15075708474 or +3197010204278 depending on your country of residence (local rates apply)
  • Save your recordings to your Google Drive or Notion using Zapier.
